Gene Synonyms

Source: R/geneSynonyms.R
geneSynonyms.Rd

Look up gene synonyms from NCBI.

geneSynonyms(organism)

Arguments

organism

string. Supported organisms:

  • Homo sapiens

  • Mus musculus

  • Drosophila melanogaster

Value

grouped_df, grouped by geneID column.

Note

Synonym support for Caenorhabditis elegans is poor on NCBI. Use the wormbase package instead.

See also

Other Annotation Functions: broadClass, convertGenesToSymbols, convertTranscriptsToGenes, convertUCSCBuildToEnsembl, detectOrganism, eggnog, emptyRanges, hgnc2gene, makeGRanges, makeGene2symbol, makeTx2gene, mgi2gene, panther, stripTranscriptVersions

Examples

x <- geneSynonyms(organism = "Homo sapiens")
#> Parsed with column specification:
#> cols(
#>   `#tax_id` = col_integer(),
#>   GeneID = col_integer(),
#>   Symbol = col_character(),
#>   LocusTag = col_character(),
#>   Synonyms = col_character(),
#>   dbXrefs = col_character(),
#>   chromosome = col_character(),
#>   map_location = col_character(),
#>   description = col_character(),
#>   type_of_gene = col_character(),
#>   Symbol_from_nomenclature_authority = col_character(),
#>   Full_name_from_nomenclature_authority = col_character(),
#>   Nomenclature_status = col_character(),
#>   Other_designations = col_character(),
#>   Modification_date = col_integer(),
#>   Feature_type = col_character()
#> )
print(x)
#> # A tibble: 19,339 x 3
#> # Groups:   geneID [19,328]
#>    geneID         geneName synonyms                                            
#>    <chr>          <chr>    <chr>                                               
#>  1 ENSG000000000… TSPAN6   T245, TM4SF6, TSPAN-6                               
#>  2 ENSG000000000… TNMD     BRICD4, CHM1L, TEM                                  
#>  3 ENSG000000004… DPM1     CDGIE, MPDS                                         
#>  4 ENSG000000004… SCYL3    PACE-1, PACE1                                       
#>  5 ENSG000000009… FGR      SRC2, c-fgr, c-src2, p55-Fgr, p55c-fgr, p58-Fgr, p5…
#>  6 ENSG000000009… CFH      AHUS1, AMBP1, ARMD4, ARMS1, CFHL3, FH, FHL1, HF, HF…
#>  7 ENSG000000010… FUCA2    dJ20N2.5                                            
#>  8 ENSG000000010… GCLC     GCL, GCS, GLCL, GLCLC                               
#>  9 ENSG000000011… NFYA     CBF-A, CBF-B, HAP2, NF-YA                           
#> 10 ENSG000000014… STPG1    C1orf201, MAPO2                                     
#> # ... with 19,329 more rows
